entries.help_viewer: Use the slider to split resources into different stacks. Additionally, the split amount can be typed in the 'Amount Split' bar.
entries.help_split_viewer: This displays the item being split.
entries.help_split_amount: Type in the exact split amount.
entries.help_set_table: The list of currently available resources, and their efficiency at this location.  A higher efficiency will result in faster harvesting.
entries.help_harvester_access: Open the hopper to retrieve or dump resources.
entries.help_hopper_dump: Empty out the hopper.  This will DESTROY all the resources currently in the hopper.
entries.help_hopper_contents: The harvested resources available for use.
entries.help_harvester_rate_spec: The theoretical maximum rate of the harvester.  Harvester health and resource quality will cause the actual rate to be lower.
entries.help_harvester_rate_actual: The actual rate of extraction.  This will depend upon the type and quality of the harvester, as well as the efficiency of the selected resource at the harvester's location.
entries.help_harvester_health: How much damage the harvester has taken.
entries.help_harvester_capacity: How much space in the harvester has been used up.
